alert.note: Alert for La Salle (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 8:23PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern La Salle County through 900 PM CDT... At 823 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Las Vegas, or 8 miles east of Big Wells, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cotulla and Woodward. This includes Interstate 35 near mile marker 68. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for south central Texas.
